imdb.title: Wine Inside Out TV
synopsis:
Filmed on-location at some of the Boston areas best restaurants and venues, Wine Inside Out TV takes a fresh approach in expanding your wine acumen and food pairing know-how. Our goal is to empower both beginners and budding connoisseurs alike to discover, select, and enjoy the wines that best suit their preferred tastes because once you find a wine that you like its a good wine! We also want you to be comfortable with who you are and make choices based on your own individual tastes rather than someone elses opinion. Wine Inside Out TV features top wine professionals who take a multi-sensory approach in evaluating the appearance, aroma, and taste of three delicious wines in a semi-blind tasting. In doing so, our expert tasting panel reveals each wines broad attributes, key characteristics, and flavor descriptors, giving our audience a real framework to learn about the worlds wine regions and styles in an unbiased way. Our featured guests also discuss other aspects of their wine life to make the experience interactive and fun.
Once all three wines are revealed, we pair the wines just tasted with some incredible food prepared by the gracious chefs and fantastic locations who host us. This will not only add to your tasting adventure, but will also give you confidence when ordering wine with your next meal. We look forward to having you join us. As always, we strongly encourage you to embrace your wine life and drink what you like. Cheers!
